name: Exit Sign
description:
Exit Sign is the game I'm working on for my final year project at LSBU. Its come a long way since development, and I'm excited for people to try it out. The game is in a basically finished state, save for testing. What would really help is if after playing this game, leave a comment here, @ me on twitter (@JustDryan) or contact me some other funky way, and tell me what you didn't like, what didn't work, and what broke. Any and all feedback is welcome!

Regardless, thanks for checking out my game, and visiting the weird world that lies behind that door.
